parameters.name: GadInstanceName
parameters.description: The ID of the global active database cluster.

parameters.name: MemberInstanceName
parameters.description: The ID of the instance that serves as the unit node you want to remove. You can call the DescribeGadInstances query the instance ID.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the central node. You can call the DescribeGadInstances operation to query the region ID.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The resource group ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstanceAttribute operation to query the resource group ID.
